cab.content: War. Cabinet. Parcels for Prisoners of War. Memorandum by the Secretary of State for War.01O3/1/62.With regard to War Cabinet 131(7), the Army Council are of opinion that it would be proper to limit the number and weight of parcels sent to Officers. They also consider that these parcels should be subjected to the same censorship as that which is applied to parcels sent to other rankft.DERBY.19th May, 1917.
